Worthy.Speaker: The Last Challenger
Worthy.Text:
I've been watching you throughout your journey. At first I thought you were just another unfortunate soul brough into this forsakened world.
But you've proven to be... much more... extraordinary.
I saw glimpses of myself in your battles, and such want to give you a special gift.
Take these, and do what I could not.
Defeat the Supreme Witch.
And then all that stands between you and Him is your own strength.

PreSupremeCalamitas.Speaker: The Last Challenger
PreSupremeCalamitas.Text: Defeat the Supreme Witch, and finish what I've started.

PostSupremeCalamitas.Speaker: The Last Challenger
PostSupremeCalamitas.Text:
You now stand where I once stood. I'm sure he's waiting for you.
Good luck, young sorcerer.
